{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Cisco 3500 3.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Cisco Aironet 802.11n Dual Band Access Point |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Cisco_AIR-CAP3502E-A-K9 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Cisco |model = AIR-CAP3502 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = E-A-K9 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = LDK102073,LDKTG2050 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Applied Micro;PowerPC 460; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = PowerPC |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Micron;; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM54610; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 28:94:0F, 54:75:D0 |oui = 28:94:0F, 54:75:D0
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe |exp_minipcie_num = 2
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 48 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.35 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/07/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833120603 |asin = B003WD6H8Q |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B00A8BN19I |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Cisco TG2050 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8364C; |rad1chip2 = Marvell;88W8063; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Cisco TG2050 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad2chip1 = Marvell;88W8364C; |rad2chip2 = Marvell;88W8063; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Part of the [[Cisco]] Aironet 3500 series. :Dual-band controller-based 802.11a/g/n.
The CPU used in this device is an ''[[AMCC]]'' PowerPC.
*[http://www.cisco.com/web/ES/seminarios/2010/10-05-14-BN2-DOCS/10-05-14-BN2-Borderless-Network-Mobility-CleanAir-Daniel-Marin.pdf PDF doc w/ some info on the Cisco 3500 series] :[[Marvell]] 88W8364C (MAC/BBP) + 88W8063 (RF - Raven) :[[Broadcom]] BCM54610 (GbE PHY)
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/prod/collateral/wireless/ps5678/ps10981/data_sheet_c78-594630.html Product page] (3500 series) *[https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/wireless/aironet-3500p-access-point/data_sheet_c78-676841.html Datasheet]
==See also== *[[Cisco AIR-CAP3502P-A-K9]] • [http://www.amazon.com/AIR-CAP3502P-A-K9-Aironet-802-11n-Wireless-Access/dp/B00G2D6ON6 Amazon] *Cisco AIR-CAP3502E-A-K9 • [http://www.amazon.com/AIR-CAP3502E-A-K9-Cisco-Aironet-Wireless-802-11a-G-N/dp/B005O9UQCE Amazon] • [http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833120603 Newegg] *[[Cisco AIR-CAP3502I-A-K9]] • [http://www.amazon.com/Cisco-AIR-CAP3502I-A-K9-3500I-Series-Access/dp/B0046SQ8GC Amazon] *[[Cisco AIR-CAP3702E-A-K9]] • [http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00UMARM68 Amazon] *[[Cisco AIR-CAP3802I-A-K9]] • [http://www.amazon.com/dp/B01HAO0YOK Amazon]
